Question: In April 2006, this person hosted Canada's Juno Awards, becoming the first non-singer and model to do so.
Hints: This was this person's first foray into reality television.
For a time, she was known as this person Lee (or Pamela Lee) after marrying Mötley Crüe drummer Tommy Lee.
On 29 September, this person and film producer Rick Salomon applied for a marriage license in Las Vegas.
